about_the_game:
Voids Adrift® is an upcoming massively multiplayer online roleplaying adventure game (MMORPG) that takes a different approach to games and the genre.

Players and their ships explore, mine and battle in a handcrafted world in breathtaking stylised detail.
Voids Adrift take players across realms and islands as they seek to enrich themselves as merchants, fight pirates, become pirates or build alliances that span across the Void and everything in between.

Players craft their ships in an innovative shipbuilding system and inhabit a world rich in diversity and lore uncommon to most genre-titans. From arabesque cities of the desert islands to the snowy settlements of the tundras. Experience different cultures, dynamics and resources to further your adventures across the Voids.

Introducing our Island Designer, A Tool designed to let the community craft their own personal island.

Each island has a chance to be part of the final game, where thousands of future players will see it.

Originally designed as an Developer in-House tool, Island Designer lets you create unique Islands Showcasing your creativeness. Each island is a unique experience. Open cities or lush jungle habitats, create stories perfect for others to discover!
